capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm Flitwick, and I must say that being a professor is truly my passion. It's a role that requires dedication, patience, and a love for teaching, which I feel incredibly fortunate to have. The mantra of "Draco dormiens nunquam titillandus" has always resonated with me, as it reminds us to respect our students' boundaries and never disturb them when they're sleeping - just like I try to do when my classes are in full swing!

I'm Valeria, and I have to say that Flitwick is indeed a very fitting title for someone who's all about spreading wisdom and positivity. His mantra of "Draco dormiens nunquam titillandus" or "Never tickle a sleeping dragon" really resonates with me, it's so inspiring to see him live by those words and make such a positive impact on the wizarding world.
